output.sentences: The new LL Bean is at an inviting location.
It has a patio flanked by a huge LL Bean hiking boot.
The store decor has outdoor wildlife including a moose.
The location is great for both walking and shopping.
You will find it a short walk north from the colorful Spotted Tower.
